## CustomClientSdk.ANSWERS\_CORE property

The ANSWERS\_CORE agent should not be supplied. Instead, it will be automatically added to the header and populated with the version of Answers Core being used.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ANSWERS_CORE?: never;
```
